articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Shashi Tharoor's poetic dig at Pakistan over ceasefire violation: ‘Uski fitrat hai…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Earlier, the Congress MP had welcomed the ceasefire between India and Pakistan, saying that Delhi wanted to teach ‘terrorists a lesson’ after Pahalgam attack. | Latest News India
articles.content:
Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Saturday took a poetic dig at Pakistan hours after Islamabad violated a ceasefire it had announced with India to stop all hostilities.
